abstract.p: We consider visualizing scales of multivariate density estimates with the help of mode trees. Mode trees visualize the locations of the modes of density estimates, when the smoothing parameter of the estimates ranges over an interval. We define multiframe mode graphs which generalize classical mode trees to the multivariate setting. We give examples of the application of multiframe mode graphs with estimates and with multivariate adaptive histograms.
